• Widget options
    • Widget handlers
  1. Widgets > 
  2. Button

Button

A simple button with text that can be set to a background color or image for each state and a callback to react to events.

  1package main
  2
  3import (
  4	"bytes"
  5	"image/color"
  6	"math"
  7	"github.com/ebitenui/ebitenui"
  8	"github.com/ebitenui/ebitenui/image"
  9	"github.com/ebitenui/ebitenui/widget"
 10	"github.com/hajimehoshi/ebiten/v2"
 11	"github.com/hajimehoshi/ebiten/v2/text/v2"
 12	"github.com/hajimehoshi/ebiten/v2/vector"
 13	"golang.org/x/image/font/gofont/goregular"
 14	"golang.org/x/image/colornames"
 15)
 16
 17type Game struct {
 18	ui *ebitenui.UI
 19}
 20
 21func NewGame() *Game {
 22	button := widget.NewButton(
 23		widget.ButtonOpts.TextLabel("Button"),
 24		widget.ButtonOpts.TextFace(DefaultFont()),
 25		widget.ButtonOpts.TextColor(&widget.ButtonTextColor{
 26			Idle:    colornames.Gainsboro,
 27			Hover:   colornames.Gainsboro,
 28			Pressed: Mix(colornames.Gainsboro, colornames.Black, 0.4),
 29		}),
 30		widget.ButtonOpts.Image(&widget.ButtonImage{
 31			Idle:         DefaultNineSlice(colornames.Darkslategray),
 32			Hover:        DefaultNineSlice(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Mediumseagreen, 0.4)),
 33			Disabled:     DefaultNineSlice(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Gainsboro, 0.8)),
 34			Pressed:      PressedNineSlice(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Black, 0.4)),
 35			PressedHover: PressedNineSlice(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Black, 0.4)),
 36		}),
 37		widget.ButtonOpts.WidgetOpts(
 38			widget.WidgetOpts.LayoutData(widget.AnchorLayoutData{
 39				VerticalPosition:   widget.AnchorLayoutPositionCenter,
 40				HorizontalPosition: widget.AnchorLayoutPositionCenter,
 41			}),
 42			widget.WidgetOpts.MinSize(180, 48),
 43		),
 44	)
 45	root := widget.NewContainer(
 46		widget.ContainerOpts.BackgroundImage(
 47			image.NewNineSliceColor(colornames.Gainsboro),
 48		),
 49		widget.ContainerOpts.Layout(widget.NewAnchorLayout()),
 50	)
 51	root.AddChild(button)
 52
 53	return &Game{
 54		ui: &ebitenui.UI{Container: root},
 55	}
 56}
 57
 58func (g *Game) Update() error {
 59	g.ui.Update()
 60	return nil
 61}
 62
 63func (g *Game) Draw(screen *ebiten.Image) {
 64	g.ui.Draw(screen)
 65}
 66
 67func (g *Game) Layout(w, h int) (int, int) {
 68	return w, h
 69}
 70
 71func DefaultFont() text.Face {
 72	s, err := text.NewGoTextFaceSource(bytes.NewReader(goregular.TTF))
 73	if err != nil {
 74		panic(err)
 75	}
 76	return &text.GoTextFace{
 77		Source: s,
 78		Size:   20,
 79	}
 80}
 81
 82func DefaultNineSlice(base color.Color) *image.NineSlice {
 83	var size float32 = 64
 84	var tiles float32 = 16
 85	var radius float32 = 8
 86
 87	tile := size / tiles
 88	facet := Mix(base, colornames.Gainsboro, 0.2)
 89
 90	img := ebiten.NewImage(int(size), int(size))
 91	path := RoundedRectPath(0, tile, size, size-tile, radius, radius, radius, radius)
 92	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
 93	path = RoundedRectPath(0, tile, size, size-tile*2, radius, radius, radius, radius)
 94	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, facet, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
 95	path = RoundedRectPath(tile, tile*2, size-tile*2, size-tile*4, radius, radius, radius, radius)
 96	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
 97
 98	return image.NewNineSliceBorder(img, int(tile*4))
 99}
100
101func PressedNineSlice(base color.Color) *image.NineSlice {
102	var size float32 = 64
103	var tiles float32 = 16
104	var radius float32 = 8
105
106	tile := size / tiles
107	facet := Mix(base, colornames.Gainsboro, 0.2)
108
109	img := ebiten.NewImage(int(size), int(size))
110	path := RoundedRectPath(0, 0, size, size, radius, radius, radius, radius)
111	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, facet, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
112	path = RoundedRectPath(tile, tile, size-tile*2, size-tile*2, radius, radius, radius, radius)
113	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
114
115	return image.NewNineSliceBorder(img, int(tile*4))
116}
117
118func Mix(a, b color.Color, percent float64) color.Color {
119	rgba := func(c color.Color) (r, g, b, a uint8) {
120		r16, g16, b16, a16 := c.RGBA()
121		return uint8(r16 >> 8), uint8(g16 >> 8), uint8(b16 >> 8), uint8(a16 >> 8)
122	}
123	lerp := func(x, y uint8) uint8 {
124		return uint8(math.Round(float64(x) + percent*(float64(y)-float64(x))))
125	}
126	r1, g1, b1, a1 := rgba(a)
127	r2, g2, b2, a2 := rgba(b)
128
129	return color.RGBA{
130		R: lerp(r1, r2),
131		G: lerp(g1, g2),
132		B: lerp(b1, b2),
133		A: lerp(a1, a2),
134	}
135}
136
137func RoundedRectPath(x, y, w, h, tl, tr, br, bl float32) *vector.Path {
138	path := &vector.Path{}
139
140	path.Arc(x+w-tr, y+tr, tr, 3*math.Pi/2, 0, vector.Clockwise)
141	path.LineTo(x+w, y+h-br)
142	path.Arc(x+w-br, y+h-br, br, 0, math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)
143	path.LineTo(x+bl, y+h)
144	path.Arc(x+bl, y+h-bl, bl, math.Pi/2, math.Pi, vector.Clockwise)
145	path.LineTo(x, y+tl)
146	path.Arc(x+tl, y+tl, tl, math.Pi, 3*math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)
147	path.Close()
148
149	return path
150}
151
152func main() {
153	ebiten.SetWindowSize(480, 320)
154	ebiten.SetWindowResizingMode(ebiten.WindowResizingModeEnabled)
155	if err := ebiten.RunGame(NewGame()); err != nil {
156		panic(err)
157	}
158}

Widget options

Text padding

Responsible for setting text offset from the center of the button.

Padding:
1button := widget.NewButton(
2		widget.ButtonOpts.TextPadding(widget.Insets{
3			Left: 88,
4		}),
5	)


  1package main
  2
  3import (
  4	"bytes"
  5	"image/color"
  6	"math"
  7	"github.com/ebitenui/ebitenui"
  8	"github.com/ebitenui/ebitenui/image"
  9	"github.com/ebitenui/ebitenui/widget"
 10	"github.com/hajimehoshi/ebiten/v2"
 11	"github.com/hajimehoshi/ebiten/v2/text/v2"
 12	"github.com/hajimehoshi/ebiten/v2/vector"
 13	"golang.org/x/image/font/gofont/goregular"
 14	"golang.org/x/image/colornames"
 15)
 16
 17type Game struct {
 18	ui *ebitenui.UI
 19}
 20
 21func NewGame() *Game {
 22	face := DefaultFont()
 23
 24	button := widget.NewButton(
 25
 26		widget.ButtonOpts.TextLabel("Button"),
 27		widget.ButtonOpts.TextFace(face),
 28		widget.ButtonOpts.TextFace(DefaultFont()),
 29		widget.ButtonOpts.TextColor(&widget.ButtonTextColor{
 30			Idle:    colornames.Gainsboro,
 31			Hover:   colornames.Gainsboro,
 32			Pressed: Mix(colornames.Gainsboro, colornames.Black, 0.4),
 33		}),
 34		widget.ButtonOpts.Image(&widget.ButtonImage{
 35			Idle:         DefaultNineSlice(colornames.Darkslategray),
 36			Hover:        DefaultNineSlice(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Mediumseagreen, 0.4)),
 37			Disabled:     DefaultNineSlice(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Gainsboro, 0.8)),
 38			Pressed:      PressedNineSlice(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Black, 0.4)),
 39			PressedHover: PressedNineSlice(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Black, 0.4)),
 40		}),
 41
 42		widget.ButtonOpts.TextPadding(widget.Insets{
 43			Left: 88,
 44		}),
 45
 46		widget.ButtonOpts.WidgetOpts(
 47			widget.WidgetOpts.LayoutData(widget.AnchorLayoutData{
 48				VerticalPosition:   widget.AnchorLayoutPositionCenter,
 49				HorizontalPosition: widget.AnchorLayoutPositionCenter,
 50			}),
 51			widget.WidgetOpts.MinSize(180, 48),
 52		),
 53
 54	)
 55
 56	root := widget.NewContainer(
 57		widget.ContainerOpts.BackgroundImage(
 58			image.NewNineSliceColor(colornames.Gainsboro),
 59		),
 60		widget.ContainerOpts.Layout(widget.NewAnchorLayout()),
 61	)
 62	root.AddChild(button)
 63
 64	return &Game{
 65		ui: &ebitenui.UI{Container: root},
 66	}
 67}

129func Mix(a, b color.Color, percent float64) color.Color {
130	rgba := func(c color.Color) (r, g, b, a uint8) {
131		r16, g16, b16, a16 := c.RGBA()
132		return uint8(r16 >> 8), uint8(g16 >> 8), uint8(b16 >> 8), uint8(a16 >> 8)
133	}
134	lerp := func(x, y uint8) uint8 {
135		return uint8(math.Round(float64(x) + percent*(float64(y)-float64(x))))
136	}
137	r1, g1, b1, a1 := rgba(a)
138	r2, g2, b2, a2 := rgba(b)
139
140	return color.RGBA{
141		R: lerp(r1, r2),
142		G: lerp(g1, g2),
143		B: lerp(b1, b2),
144		A: lerp(a1, a2),
145	}
146}

148func RoundedRectPath(x, y, w, h, tl, tr, br, bl float32) *vector.Path {
149	path := &vector.Path{}
150
151	path.Arc(x+w-tr, y+tr, tr, 3*math.Pi/2, 0, vector.Clockwise)
152	path.LineTo(x+w, y+h-br)
153	path.Arc(x+w-br, y+h-br, br, 0, math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)
154	path.LineTo(x+bl, y+h)
155	path.Arc(x+bl, y+h-bl, bl, math.Pi/2, math.Pi, vector.Clockwise)
156	path.LineTo(x, y+tl)
157	path.Arc(x+tl, y+tl, tl, math.Pi, 3*math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)
158	path.Close()
159
160	return path
161}

127func Mix(a, b color.Color, percent float64) color.Color {

134	}

136	r2, g2, b2, a2 := rgba(b)
137
138	return color.RGBA{
139		R: lerp(r1, r2),
140		G: lerp(g1, g2),

146func RoundedRectPath(x, y, w, h, tl, tr, br, bl float32) *vector.Path {
147	path := &vector.Path{}
148
149	path.Arc(x+w-tr, y+tr, tr, 3*math.Pi/2, 0, vector.Clockwise)

156	path.Close()

 91func DefaultNineSlice(base color.Color) *image.NineSlice {
 92	var size float32 = 64
 93	var tiles float32 = 16
 94	var radius float32 = 8
 95
 96	tile := size / tiles
 97	facet := Mix(base, colornames.Gainsboro, 0.2)

127func Mix(a, b color.Color, percent float64) color.Color {
128	rgba := func(c color.Color) (r, g, b, a uint8) {
129		r16, g16, b16, a16 := c.RGBA()
130		return uint8(r16 >> 8), uint8(g16 >> 8), uint8(b16 >> 8), uint8(a16 >> 8)
131	}
132	lerp := func(x, y uint8) uint8 {
133		return uint8(math.Round(float64(x) + percent*(float64(y)-float64(x))))
134	}
135	r1, g1, b1, a1 := rgba(a)
136	r2, g2, b2, a2 := rgba(b)
137
138	return color.RGBA{
139		R: lerp(r1, r2),
140		G: lerp(g1, g2),
141		B: lerp(b1, b2),
142		A: lerp(a1, a2),
143	}
144}
145
146func RoundedRectPath(x, y, w, h, tl, tr, br, bl float32) *vector.Path {
147	path := &vector.Path{}
148
149	path.Arc(x+w-tr, y+tr, tr, 3*math.Pi/2, 0, vector.Clockwise)
150	path.LineTo(x+w, y+h-br)
151	path.Arc(x+w-br, y+h-br, br, 0, math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)
152	path.LineTo(x+bl, y+h)
153	path.Arc(x+bl, y+h-bl, bl, math.Pi/2, math.Pi, vector.Clockwise)
154	path.LineTo(x, y+tl)
155	path.Arc(x+tl, y+tl, tl, math.Pi, 3*math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)
156	path.Close()
157
158	return path
159}

 21func NewGame() *Game {
 22
 23	button := widget.NewButton(
 24
 25		widget.ButtonOpts.TextLabel("Button"),
 26		widget.ButtonOpts.TextFace(DefaultFont()),
 27		widget.ButtonOpts.TextColor(&widget.ButtonTextColor{
 28			Idle:    colornames.Gainsboro,
 29			Hover:   colornames.Gainsboro,
 30			Pressed: Mix(colornames.Gainsboro, colornames.Black, 0.4),
 31		}),
 32		widget.ButtonOpts.Image(&widget.ButtonImage{
 33			Idle:         DefaultNineSlice(colornames.Darkslategray),
 34			Hover:        DefaultNineSlice(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Mediumseagreen, 0.4)),
 35			Disabled:     DefaultNineSlice(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Gainsboro, 0.8)),
 36			Pressed:      PressedNineSlice(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Black, 0.4)),
 37			PressedHover: PressedNineSlice(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Black, 0.4)),
 38		}),
 39
 40		widget.ButtonOpts.TextPadding(widget.Insets{
 41			Bottom: 14,
 42		}),
 43
 44		widget.ButtonOpts.WidgetOpts(
 45			widget.WidgetOpts.LayoutData(widget.AnchorLayoutData{
 46				VerticalPosition:   widget.AnchorLayoutPositionCenter,
 47				HorizontalPosition: widget.AnchorLayoutPositionCenter,
 48			}),
 49			widget.WidgetOpts.MinSize(180, 48),
 50		),
 51
 52	)
 53
 54	root := widget.NewContainer(
 55		widget.ContainerOpts.BackgroundImage(
 56			image.NewNineSliceColor(colornames.Gainsboro),
 57		),
 58		widget.ContainerOpts.Layout(widget.NewAnchorLayout()),
 59	)
 60	root.AddChild(button)
 61
 62	return &Game{
 63		ui: &ebitenui.UI{Container: root},
 64	}
 65}

131	}

134	}

137
138	return color.RGBA{

140		G: lerp(g1, g2),

154	path.Arc(x+bl, y+h-bl, bl, math.Pi/2, math.Pi, vector.Clockwise)
155	path.LineTo(x, y+tl)
156	path.Arc(x+tl, y+tl, tl, math.Pi, 3*math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)
157	path.Close()
158
159	return path
160}

165	if err := ebiten.RunGame(NewGame()); err != nil {
166		panic(err)
167	}

 58		),

 81func DefaultFont() text.Face {
 82	s, err := text.NewGoTextFaceSource(bytes.NewReader(goregular.TTF))
 83	if err != nil {
 84		panic(err)
 85	}
 86	return &text.GoTextFace{
 87		Source: s,
 88		Size:   20,
 89	}
 90}

 92func DefaultNineSlice(base color.Color) *image.NineSlice {
 93	var size float32 = 64
 94	var tiles float32 = 16
 95	var radius float32 = 8
 96
 97	tile := size / tiles
 98	facet := Mix(base, colornames.Gainsboro, 0.2)
 99
100	img := ebiten.NewImage(int(size), int(size))
101	path := RoundedRectPath(0, tile, size, size-tile, radius, radius, radius, radius)
102	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
103	path = RoundedRectPath(0, tile, size, size-tile*2, radius, radius, radius, radius)
104	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, facet, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
105	path = RoundedRectPath(tile, tile*2, size-tile*2, size-tile*4, radius, radius, radius, radius)
106	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
107
108	return image.NewNineSliceBorder(img, int(tile*4))
109}
110
111func PressedNineSlice(base color.Color) *image.NineSlice {
112	var size float32 = 64
113	var tiles float32 = 16
114	var radius float32 = 8
115
116	tile := size / tiles
117	facet := Mix(base, colornames.Gainsboro, 0.2)
118
119	img := ebiten.NewImage(int(size), int(size))
120	path := RoundedRectPath(0, 0, size, size, radius, radius, radius, radius)
121	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, facet, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
122	path = RoundedRectPath(tile, tile, size-tile*2, size-tile*2, radius, radius, radius, radius)
123	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
124
125	return image.NewNineSliceBorder(img, int(tile*4))
126}
127
128func Mix(a, b color.Color, percent float64) color.Color {
129	rgba := func(c color.Color) (r, g, b, a uint8) {
130		r16, g16, b16, a16 := c.RGBA()
131		return uint8(r16 >> 8), uint8(g16 >> 8), uint8(b16 >> 8), uint8(a16 >> 8)
132	}
133	lerp := func(x, y uint8) uint8 {
134		return uint8(math.Round(float64(x) + percent*(float64(y)-float64(x))))
135	}
136	r1, g1, b1, a1 := rgba(a)
137	r2, g2, b2, a2 := rgba(b)
138
139	return color.RGBA{
140		R: lerp(r1, r2),
141		G: lerp(g1, g2),
142		B: lerp(b1, b2),
143		A: lerp(a1, a2),
144	}
145}
146
147func RoundedRectPath(x, y, w, h, tl, tr, br, bl float32) *vector.Path {
148	path := &vector.Path{}
149
150	path.Arc(x+w-tr, y+tr, tr, 3*math.Pi/2, 0, vector.Clockwise)
151	path.LineTo(x+w, y+h-br)
152	path.Arc(x+w-br, y+h-br, br, 0, math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)
153	path.LineTo(x+bl, y+h)
154	path.Arc(x+bl, y+h-bl, bl, math.Pi/2, math.Pi, vector.Clockwise)
155	path.LineTo(x, y+tl)
156	path.Arc(x+tl, y+tl, tl, math.Pi, 3*math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)
157	path.Close()
158
159	return path
160}

167	}

 65	}

 92func DefaultNineSlice(base color.Color) *image.NineSlice {
 93	var size float32 = 64
 94	var tiles float32 = 16
 95	var radius float32 = 8
 96
 97	tile := size / tiles
 98	facet := Mix(base, colornames.Gainsboro, 0.2)
 99
100	img := ebiten.NewImage(int(size), int(size))
101	path := RoundedRectPath(0, tile, size, size-tile, radius, radius, radius, radius)
102	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
103	path = RoundedRectPath(0, tile, size, size-tile*2, radius, radius, radius, radius)
104	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, facet, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
105	path = RoundedRectPath(tile, tile*2, size-tile*2, size-tile*4, radius, radius, radius, radius)
106	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
107
108	return image.NewNineSliceBorder(img, int(tile*4))
109}
110
111func PressedNineSlice(base color.Color) *image.NineSlice {
112	var size float32 = 64
113	var tiles float32 = 16
114	var radius float32 = 8
115
116	tile := size / tiles
117	facet := Mix(base, colornames.Gainsboro, 0.2)
118
119	img := ebiten.NewImage(int(size), int(size))
120	path := RoundedRectPath(0, 0, size, size, radius, radius, radius, radius)
121	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, facet, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
122	path = RoundedRectPath(tile, tile, size-tile*2, size-tile*2, radius, radius, radius, radius)
123	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
124
125	return image.NewNineSliceBorder(img, int(tile*4))
126}

128func Mix(a, b color.Color, percent float64) color.Color {
129	rgba := func(c color.Color) (r, g, b, a uint8) {
130		r16, g16, b16, a16 := c.RGBA()
131		return uint8(r16 >> 8), uint8(g16 >> 8), uint8(b16 >> 8), uint8(a16 >> 8)
132	}
133	lerp := func(x, y uint8) uint8 {
134		return uint8(math.Round(float64(x) + percent*(float64(y)-float64(x))))
135	}
136	r1, g1, b1, a1 := rgba(a)
137	r2, g2, b2, a2 := rgba(b)
138
139	return color.RGBA{
140		R: lerp(r1, r2),
141		G: lerp(g1, g2),
142		B: lerp(b1, b2),
143		A: lerp(a1, a2),
144	}
145}
146
147func RoundedRectPath(x, y, w, h, tl, tr, br, bl float32) *vector.Path {
148	path := &vector.Path{}
149
150	path.Arc(x+w-tr, y+tr, tr, 3*math.Pi/2, 0, vector.Clockwise)
151	path.LineTo(x+w, y+h-br)
152	path.Arc(x+w-br, y+h-br, br, 0, math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)
153	path.LineTo(x+bl, y+h)
154	path.Arc(x+bl, y+h-bl, bl, math.Pi/2, math.Pi, vector.Clockwise)
155	path.LineTo(x, y+tl)
156	path.Arc(x+tl, y+tl, tl, math.Pi, 3*math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)
157	path.Close()
158
159	return path
160}

 21func NewGame() *Game {
 22
 23	button := widget.NewButton(
 24
 25		widget.ButtonOpts.TextLabel("Button"),
 26		widget.ButtonOpts.TextFace(DefaultFont()),
 27		widget.ButtonOpts.TextColor(&widget.ButtonTextColor{
 28			Idle:    colornames.Gainsboro,
 29			Hover:   colornames.Gainsboro,
 30			Pressed: Mix(colornames.Gainsboro, colornames.Black, 0.4),
 31		}),
 32		widget.ButtonOpts.Image(&widget.ButtonImage{
 33			Idle:         DefaultNineSlice(colornames.Darkslategray),
 34			Hover:        DefaultNineSlice(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Mediumseagreen, 0.4)),
 35			Disabled:     DefaultNineSlice(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Gainsboro, 0.8)),
 36			Pressed:      PressedNineSlice(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Black, 0.4)),
 37			PressedHover: PressedNineSlice(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Black, 0.4)),
 38		}),
 39
 40		widget.ButtonOpts.TextPosition(
 41			widget.TextPositionStart,
 42			widget.TextPositionEnd,
 43		),
 44
 45		widget.ButtonOpts.WidgetOpts(
 46			widget.WidgetOpts.LayoutData(widget.AnchorLayoutData{
 47				VerticalPosition:   widget.AnchorLayoutPositionCenter,
 48				HorizontalPosition: widget.AnchorLayoutPositionCenter,
 49			}),
 50			widget.WidgetOpts.MinSize(180, 48),
 51		),
 52
 53	)
 54
 55	root := widget.NewContainer(
 56		widget.ContainerOpts.BackgroundImage(
 57			image.NewNineSliceColor(colornames.Gainsboro),
 58		),
 59		widget.ContainerOpts.Layout(widget.NewAnchorLayout()),
 60	)
 61	root.AddChild(button)
 62
 63	return &Game{
 64		ui: &ebitenui.UI{Container: root},
 65	}
 66}

128func Mix(a, b color.Color, percent float64) color.Color {
129	rgba := func(c color.Color) (r, g, b, a uint8) {
130		r16, g16, b16, a16 := c.RGBA()
131		return uint8(r16 >> 8), uint8(g16 >> 8), uint8(b16 >> 8), uint8(a16 >> 8)
132	}
133	lerp := func(x, y uint8) uint8 {
134		return uint8(math.Round(float64(x) + percent*(float64(y)-float64(x))))
135	}
136	r1, g1, b1, a1 := rgba(a)
137	r2, g2, b2, a2 := rgba(b)
138
139	return color.RGBA{
140		R: lerp(r1, r2),
141		G: lerp(g1, g2),
142		B: lerp(b1, b2),
143		A: lerp(a1, a2),
144	}
145}

147func RoundedRectPath(x, y, w, h, tl, tr, br, bl float32) *vector.Path {
148	path := &vector.Path{}

150	path.Arc(x+w-tr, y+tr, tr, 3*math.Pi/2, 0, vector.Clockwise)
151	path.LineTo(x+w, y+h-br)

155	path.LineTo(x, y+tl)
156	path.Arc(x+tl, y+tl, tl, math.Pi, 3*math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)
157	path.Close()
158
159	return path
160}

141		R: lerp(r1, r2),
142		G: lerp(g1, g2),
143		B: lerp(b1, b2),
144		A: lerp(a1, a2),
145	}
146}
147
148func RoundedRectPath(x, y, w, h, tl, tr, br, bl float32) *vector.Path {
149	path := &vector.Path{}
150
151	path.Arc(x+w-tr, y+tr, tr, 3*math.Pi/2, 0, vector.Clockwise)
152	path.LineTo(x+w, y+h-br)
153	path.Arc(x+w-br, y+h-br, br, 0, math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)
154	path.LineTo(x+bl, y+h)
155	path.Arc(x+bl, y+h-bl, bl, math.Pi/2, math.Pi, vector.Clockwise)
156	path.LineTo(x, y+tl)
157	path.Arc(x+tl, y+tl, tl, math.Pi, 3*math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)
158	path.Close()
159
160	return path
161}
162
163func main() {
164	ebiten.SetWindowSize(480, 320)
165	ebiten.SetWindowResizingMode(ebiten.WindowResizingModeEnabled)
166	if err := ebiten.RunGame(NewGame()); err != nil {
167		panic(err)
168	}
169}

 21func NewGame() *Game {
 22
 23	button := widget.NewButton(
 24
 25		widget.ButtonOpts.TextFace(DefaultFont()),

 27			Idle:    colornames.Gainsboro,
 28			Hover:   colornames.Gainsboro,

 32			Idle:         DefaultNineSlice(colornames.Darkslategray),
 33			Hover:        DefaultNineSlice(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Mediumseagreen, 0.4)),
 34			Disabled:     DefaultNineSlice(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Gainsboro, 0.8)),
 35			Pressed:      PressedNineSlice(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Black, 0.4)),
 36			PressedHover: PressedNineSlice(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Black, 0.4)),
 37		}),
 38
 39		widget.ButtonOpts.TextLabel("Login"),
 40
 41		widget.ButtonOpts.WidgetOpts(
 42			widget.WidgetOpts.LayoutData(widget.AnchorLayoutData{
 43				VerticalPosition:   widget.AnchorLayoutPositionCenter,
 44				HorizontalPosition: widget.AnchorLayoutPositionCenter,
 45			}),
 46			widget.WidgetOpts.MinSize(180, 48),
 47		),
 48
 49	)

 52		widget.ContainerOpts.BackgroundImage(
 53			image.NewNineSliceColor(colornames.Gainsboro),
 54		),
 55		widget.ContainerOpts.Layout(widget.NewAnchorLayout()),
 56	)

 58
 59	return &Game{
 60		ui: &ebitenui.UI{Container: root},

 77func DefaultFont() text.Face {
 78	s, err := text.NewGoTextFaceSource(bytes.NewReader(goregular.TTF))
 79	if err != nil {
 80		panic(err)
 81	}
 82	return &text.GoTextFace{
 83		Source: s,
 84		Size:   20,
 85	}
 86}
 87
 88func DefaultNineSlice(base color.Color) *image.NineSlice {
 89	var size float32 = 64
 90	var tiles float32 = 16
 91	var radius float32 = 8
 92
 93	tile := size / tiles
 94	facet := Mix(base, colornames.Gainsboro, 0.2)
 95
 96	img := ebiten.NewImage(int(size), int(size))
 97	path := RoundedRectPath(0, tile, size, size-tile, radius, radius, radius, radius)
 98	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
 99	path = RoundedRectPath(0, tile, size, size-tile*2, radius, radius, radius, radius)
100	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, facet, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
101	path = RoundedRectPath(tile, tile*2, size-tile*2, size-tile*4, radius, radius, radius, radius)
102	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
103
104	return image.NewNineSliceBorder(img, int(tile*4))
105}
106
107func PressedNineSlice(base color.Color) *image.NineSlice {
108	var size float32 = 64
109	var tiles float32 = 16
110	var radius float32 = 8
111
112	tile := size / tiles
113	facet := Mix(base, colornames.Gainsboro, 0.2)
114
115	img := ebiten.NewImage(int(size), int(size))
116	path := RoundedRectPath(0, 0, size, size, radius, radius, radius, radius)
117	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, facet, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
118	path = RoundedRectPath(tile, tile, size-tile*2, size-tile*2, radius, radius, radius, radius)
119	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
120
121	return image.NewNineSliceBorder(img, int(tile*4))
122}
123
124func Mix(a, b color.Color, percent float64) color.Color {
125	rgba := func(c color.Color) (r, g, b, a uint8) {
126		r16, g16, b16, a16 := c.RGBA()
127		return uint8(r16 >> 8), uint8(g16 >> 8), uint8(b16 >> 8), uint8(a16 >> 8)
128	}
129	lerp := func(x, y uint8) uint8 {
130		return uint8(math.Round(float64(x) + percent*(float64(y)-float64(x))))
131	}
132	r1, g1, b1, a1 := rgba(a)
133	r2, g2, b2, a2 := rgba(b)
134
135	return color.RGBA{
136		R: lerp(r1, r2),
137		G: lerp(g1, g2),
138		B: lerp(b1, b2),
139		A: lerp(a1, a2),
140	}
141}
142
143func RoundedRectPath(x, y, w, h, tl, tr, br, bl float32) *vector.Path {
144	path := &vector.Path{}
145
146	path.Arc(x+w-tr, y+tr, tr, 3*math.Pi/2, 0, vector.Clockwise)
147	path.LineTo(x+w, y+h-br)
148	path.Arc(x+w-br, y+h-br, br, 0, math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)
149	path.LineTo(x+bl, y+h)
150	path.Arc(x+bl, y+h-bl, bl, math.Pi/2, math.Pi, vector.Clockwise)
151	path.LineTo(x, y+tl)
152	path.Arc(x+tl, y+tl, tl, math.Pi, 3*math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)
153	path.Close()
154
155	return path
156}
157

162		panic(err)
163	}
164}

Text Process BBCode

Responsible for processing text with BBCode.

The only tag currently supported is [color=#][/color].

Enabled:

15		),

 28			Hover:   colornames.Gainsboro,
 29			Pressed: Mix(colornames.Gainsboro, colornames.Black, 0.4),
 30		}),
 31		widget.ButtonOpts.Image(&widget.ButtonImage{
 32			Idle:         DefaultNineSlice(colornames.Darkslategray),
 33			Hover:        DefaultNineSlice(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Mediumseagreen, 0.4)),
 34			Disabled:     DefaultNineSlice(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Gainsboro, 0.8)),
 35			Pressed:      PressedNineSlice(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Black, 0.4)),
 36			PressedHover: PressedNineSlice(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Black, 0.4)),
 37		}),
 38
 39		widget.ButtonOpts.TextProcessBBCode(false),
 40		widget.ButtonOpts.TextLabel("[color=#A2005C]Multiplayer[/color]"),
 41
 42		widget.ButtonOpts.WidgetOpts(
 43			widget.WidgetOpts.LayoutData(widget.AnchorLayoutData{
 44				VerticalPosition:   widget.AnchorLayoutPositionCenter,
 45				HorizontalPosition: widget.AnchorLayoutPositionCenter,
 46			}),
 47			widget.WidgetOpts.MinSize(320, 48),
 48		),
 49
 50	)
 51
 52	root := widget.NewContainer(
 53		widget.ContainerOpts.BackgroundImage(
 54			image.NewNineSliceColor(colornames.Gainsboro),
 55		),
 56		widget.ContainerOpts.Layout(widget.NewAnchorLayout()),
 57	)
 58	root.AddChild(button)
 59	return &Game{
 60		ui: &ebitenui.UI{Container: root},
 61	}
 62}

 65	g.ui.Update()
 66	return nil
 67}

 70	g.ui.Draw(screen)
 71}

 77func DefaultFont() text.Face {
 78	s, err := text.NewGoTextFaceSource(bytes.NewReader(goregular.TTF))
 79	if err != nil {
 80		panic(err)
 81	}
 82	return &text.GoTextFace{
 83		Source: s,
 84		Size:   20,
 85	}
 86}

 88func DefaultNineSlice(base color.Color) *image.NineSlice {
 89	var size float32 = 64
 90	var tiles float32 = 16
 91	var radius float32 = 8
 92
 93	tile := size / tiles
 94	facet := Mix(base, colornames.Gainsboro, 0.2)
 95
 96	img := ebiten.NewImage(int(size), int(size))
 97	path := RoundedRectPath(0, tile, size, size-tile, radius, radius, radius, radius)
 98	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
 99	path = RoundedRectPath(0, tile, size, size-tile*2, radius, radius, radius, radius)
100	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, facet, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
101	path = RoundedRectPath(tile, tile*2, size-tile*2, size-tile*4, radius, radius, radius, radius)
102	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
103
104	return image.NewNineSliceBorder(img, int(tile*4))
105}
106
107func PressedNineSlice(base color.Color) *image.NineSlice {
108	var size float32 = 64
109	var tiles float32 = 16
110	var radius float32 = 8
111
112	tile := size / tiles
113	facet := Mix(base, colornames.Gainsboro, 0.2)
114
115	img := ebiten.NewImage(int(size), int(size))
116	path := RoundedRectPath(0, 0, size, size, radius, radius, radius, radius)
117	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, facet, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
118	path = RoundedRectPath(tile, tile, size-tile*2, size-tile*2, radius, radius, radius, radius)
119	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
120
121	return image.NewNineSliceBorder(img, int(tile*4))
122}
123
124func Mix(a, b color.Color, percent float64) color.Color {
125	rgba := func(c color.Color) (r, g, b, a uint8) {
126		r16, g16, b16, a16 := c.RGBA()
127		return uint8(r16 >> 8), uint8(g16 >> 8), uint8(b16 >> 8), uint8(a16 >> 8)
128	}
129	lerp := func(x, y uint8) uint8 {
130		return uint8(math.Round(float64(x) + percent*(float64(y)-float64(x))))
131	}
132	r1, g1, b1, a1 := rgba(a)
133	r2, g2, b2, a2 := rgba(b)
134
135	return color.RGBA{
136		R: lerp(r1, r2),
137		G: lerp(g1, g2),
138		B: lerp(b1, b2),
139		A: lerp(a1, a2),
140	}
141}
142
143func RoundedRectPath(x, y, w, h, tl, tr, br, bl float32) *vector.Path {
144	path := &vector.Path{}
145
146	path.Arc(x+w-tr, y+tr, tr, 3*math.Pi/2, 0, vector.Clockwise)
147	path.LineTo(x+w, y+h-br)
148	path.Arc(x+w-br, y+h-br, br, 0, math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)
149	path.LineTo(x+bl, y+h)
150	path.Arc(x+bl, y+h-bl, bl, math.Pi/2, math.Pi, vector.Clockwise)
151	path.LineTo(x, y+tl)
152	path.Arc(x+tl, y+tl, tl, math.Pi, 3*math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)
153	path.Close()
154
155	return path
156}

161	if err := ebiten.RunGame(NewGame()); err != nil {
162		panic(err)
163	}
164}

126	path := &vector.Path{}
127
128	path.Arc(x+w-tr, y+tr, tr, 3*math.Pi/2, 0, vector.Clockwise)
129	path.LineTo(x+w, y+h-br)
130	path.Arc(x+w-br, y+h-br, br, 0, math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)
131	path.LineTo(x+bl, y+h)
132	path.Arc(x+bl, y+h-bl, bl, math.Pi/2, math.Pi, vector.Clockwise)
133	path.LineTo(x, y+tl)
134	path.Arc(x+tl, y+tl, tl, math.Pi, 3*math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)
135	path.Close()
136
137	return path
138}

142	ebiten.SetWindowResizingMode(ebiten.WindowResizingModeEnabled)
143	if err := ebiten.RunGame(NewGame()); err != nil {
144		panic(err)
145	}

  1package main

  3import (
  4	"bytes"
  5	"image/color"

  7	"github.com/ebitenui/ebitenui"
  8	"github.com/ebitenui/ebitenui/image"
  9	"github.com/ebitenui/ebitenui/widget"
 10	"github.com/hajimehoshi/ebiten/v2"
 11	"github.com/hajimehoshi/ebiten/v2/text/v2"
 12	"github.com/hajimehoshi/ebiten/v2/vector"
 13	"golang.org/x/image/font/gofont/goregular"
 14	"golang.org/x/image/colornames"

 17type Game struct {
 18	ui *ebitenui.UI
 19}
 20
 21func NewGame() *Game {
 22
 23	button := widget.NewButton(
 24
 25		widget.ButtonOpts.TextLabel("Button"),
 26		widget.ButtonOpts.TextFace(DefaultFont()),
 27		widget.ButtonOpts.Image(&widget.ButtonImage{
 28			Idle:         DefaultNineSlice(colornames.Darkslategray),
 29			Hover:        DefaultNineSlice(colornames.Darkslategray),
 30			Disabled:     DefaultNineSlice(colornames.Darkslategray),
 31			Pressed:      DefaultNineSlice(colornames.Darkslategray),
 32			PressedHover: DefaultNineSlice(colornames.Darkslategray),
 33		}),
 34
 35		widget.ButtonOpts.TextColor(&widget.ButtonTextColor{
 36			Idle:    colornames.Goldenrod,
 37			Hover:   colornames.Indianred,
 38			Pressed: colornames.Steelblue,
 39		}),
 40
 41		widget.ButtonOpts.WidgetOpts(
 42			widget.WidgetOpts.LayoutData(widget.AnchorLayoutData{
 43				VerticalPosition:   widget.AnchorLayoutPositionCenter,
 44				HorizontalPosition: widget.AnchorLayoutPositionCenter,
 45			}),
 46			widget.WidgetOpts.MinSize(180, 48),
 47		),
 48
 49	)
 50
 51	button.GetWidget().CursorEnterEvent.Fire(&widget.WidgetCursorEnterEventArgs{})
 52	root := widget.NewContainer(
 53		widget.ContainerOpts.BackgroundImage(
 54			image.NewNineSliceColor(colornames.Gainsboro),
 55		),
 56		widget.ContainerOpts.Layout(widget.NewAnchorLayout()),
 57	)
 58	root.AddChild(button)
 59
 60	return &Game{
 61		ui: &ebitenui.UI{Container: root},
 62	}
 63}

 78func DefaultFont() text.Face {
 79	s, err := text.NewGoTextFaceSource(bytes.NewReader(goregular.TTF))
 80	if err != nil {
 81		panic(err)
 82	}
 83	return &text.GoTextFace{
 84		Source: s,
 85		Size:   20,
 86	}
 87}

 89func DefaultNineSlice(base color.Color) *image.NineSlice {
 90	var size float32 = 64
 91	var tiles float32 = 16
 92	var radius float32 = 8
 93
 94	tile := size / tiles
 95	facet := Mix(base, colornames.Gainsboro, 0.2)
 96
 97	img := ebiten.NewImage(int(size), int(size))
 98	path := RoundedRectPath(0, tile, size, size-tile, radius, radius, radius, radius)
 99	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
100	path = RoundedRectPath(0, tile, size, size-tile*2, radius, radius, radius, radius)
101	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, facet, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
102	path = RoundedRectPath(tile, tile*2, size-tile*2, size-tile*4, radius, radius, radius, radius)
103	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
104
105	return image.NewNineSliceBorder(img, int(tile*4))
106}
107
108func PressedNineSlice(base color.Color) *image.NineSlice {
109	var size float32 = 64
110	var tiles float32 = 16
111	var radius float32 = 8
112
113	tile := size / tiles
114	facet := Mix(base, colornames.Gainsboro, 0.2)
115
116	img := ebiten.NewImage(int(size), int(size))
117	path := RoundedRectPath(0, 0, size, size, radius, radius, radius, radius)
118	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, facet, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
119	path = RoundedRectPath(tile, tile, size-tile*2, size-tile*2, radius, radius, radius, radius)
120	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
121
122	return image.NewNineSliceBorder(img, int(tile*4))
123}
124
125func Mix(a, b color.Color, percent float64) color.Color {
126	rgba := func(c color.Color) (r, g, b, a uint8) {
127		r16, g16, b16, a16 := c.RGBA()
128		return uint8(r16 >> 8), uint8(g16 >> 8), uint8(b16 >> 8), uint8(a16 >> 8)
129	}
130	lerp := func(x, y uint8) uint8 {
131		return uint8(math.Round(float64(x) + percent*(float64(y)-float64(x))))
132	}
133	r1, g1, b1, a1 := rgba(a)
134	r2, g2, b2, a2 := rgba(b)
135
136	return color.RGBA{
137		R: lerp(r1, r2),
138		G: lerp(g1, g2),
139		B: lerp(b1, b2),
140		A: lerp(a1, a2),
141	}
142}
143
144func RoundedRectPath(x, y, w, h, tl, tr, br, bl float32) *vector.Path {
145	path := &vector.Path{}
146
147	path.Arc(x+w-tr, y+tr, tr, 3*math.Pi/2, 0, vector.Clockwise)
148	path.LineTo(x+w, y+h-br)
149	path.Arc(x+w-br, y+h-br, br, 0, math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)
150	path.LineTo(x+bl, y+h)
151	path.Arc(x+bl, y+h-bl, bl, math.Pi/2, math.Pi, vector.Clockwise)
152	path.LineTo(x, y+tl)
153	path.Arc(x+tl, y+tl, tl, math.Pi, 3*math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)
154	path.Close()
155
156	return path
157}

163		panic(err)
164	}
165}

126func Mix(a, b color.Color, percent float64) color.Color {
127	rgba := func(c color.Color) (r, g, b, a uint8) {
128		r16, g16, b16, a16 := c.RGBA()
129		return uint8(r16 >> 8), uint8(g16 >> 8), uint8(b16 >> 8), uint8(a16 >> 8)
130	}
131	lerp := func(x, y uint8) uint8 {
132		return uint8(math.Round(float64(x) + percent*(float64(y)-float64(x))))
133	}
134	r1, g1, b1, a1 := rgba(a)
135	r2, g2, b2, a2 := rgba(b)
136
137	return color.RGBA{
138		R: lerp(r1, r2),
139		G: lerp(g1, g2),
140		B: lerp(b1, b2),
141		A: lerp(a1, a2),
142	}
143}

145func RoundedRectPath(x, y, w, h, tl, tr, br, bl float32) *vector.Path {
146	path := &vector.Path{}
147
148	path.Arc(x+w-tr, y+tr, tr, 3*math.Pi/2, 0, vector.Clockwise)

154	path.Arc(x+tl, y+tl, tl, math.Pi, 3*math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)

 64	return nil
 65}
 66
 67func (g *Game) Draw(screen *ebiten.Image) {
 68	g.ui.Draw(screen)
 69}
 70
 71func (g *Game) Layout(w, h int) (int, int) {
 72	return w, h
 73}
 74
 75func DefaultFont() text.Face {
 76	s, err := text.NewGoTextFaceSource(bytes.NewReader(goregular.TTF))
 77	if err != nil {
 78		panic(err)
 79	}
 80	return &text.GoTextFace{
 81		Source: s,
 82		Size:   20,
 83	}
 84}
 85
 86func DefaultPill(base color.Color) *image.NineSlice {
 87	var size float32 = 64
 88	var tiles float32 = 16
 89	var radius float32 = 8
 90
 91	tile := size / tiles
 92	facet := Mix(base, colornames.Gainsboro, 0.2)
 93
 94	img := ebiten.NewImage(int(size), int(size))
 95	path := RoundedRectPath(0, tile, size, size-tile, radius, radius, radius, radius)
 96	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
 97	path = RoundedRectPath(0, tile, size, size-tile*2, radius, radius, radius, radius)
 98	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, facet, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
 99	path = RoundedRectPath(tile, tile*2, size-tile*2, size-tile*4, radius, radius, radius, radius)
100	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
101
102	return image.NewNineSliceBorder(img, int(tile*4))
103}
104
105func PressedPill(base color.Color) *image.NineSlice {
106	var size float32 = 64
107	var tiles float32 = 16
108	var radius float32 = 8
109
110	tile := size / tiles
111	facet := Mix(base, colornames.Gainsboro, 0.2)
112
113	img := ebiten.NewImage(int(size), int(size))
114	path := RoundedRectPath(0, 0, size, size, radius, radius, radius, radius)
115	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, facet, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
116	path = RoundedRectPath(tile, tile, size-tile*2, size-tile*2, radius, radius, radius, radius)
117	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
118
119	return image.NewNineSliceBorder(img, int(tile*4))
120}
121
122func Mix(a, b color.Color, percent float64) color.Color {
123	rgba := func(c color.Color) (r, g, b, a uint8) {
124		r16, g16, b16, a16 := c.RGBA()
125		return uint8(r16 >> 8), uint8(g16 >> 8), uint8(b16 >> 8), uint8(a16 >> 8)
126	}
127	lerp := func(x, y uint8) uint8 {
128		return uint8(math.Round(float64(x) + percent*(float64(y)-float64(x))))
129	}
130	r1, g1, b1, a1 := rgba(a)
131	r2, g2, b2, a2 := rgba(b)
132
133	return color.RGBA{
134		R: lerp(r1, r2),
135		G: lerp(g1, g2),
136		B: lerp(b1, b2),
137		A: lerp(a1, a2),
138	}
139}
140
141func RoundedRectPath(x, y, w, h, tl, tr, br, bl float32) *vector.Path {
142	path := &vector.Path{}
143
144	path.Arc(x+w-tr, y+tr, tr, 3*math.Pi/2, 0, vector.Clockwise)
145	path.LineTo(x+w, y+h-br)
146	path.Arc(x+w-br, y+h-br, br, 0, math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)
147	path.LineTo(x+bl, y+h)
148	path.Arc(x+bl, y+h-bl, bl, math.Pi/2, math.Pi, vector.Clockwise)
149	path.LineTo(x, y+tl)
150	path.Arc(x+tl, y+tl, tl, math.Pi, 3*math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)
151	path.Close()
152
153	return path
154}

157	ebiten.SetWindowSize(480, 320)

160		panic(err)
161	}
162}

4			Hover:   DefaultPill(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Mediumseagreen, 0.4)),
5			Pressed: PressedPill(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Black, 0.4)),
6		}),

  1package main

  3import (
  4	"bytes"

  8	"github.com/ebitenui/ebitenui/image"
  9	"github.com/ebitenui/ebitenui/widget"
 10	"github.com/hajimehoshi/ebiten/v2"
 11	"github.com/hajimehoshi/ebiten/v2/text/v2"
 12	"github.com/hajimehoshi/ebiten/v2/vector"
 13	"golang.org/x/image/font/gofont/goregular"
 14	"golang.org/x/image/colornames"
 15)

 17type Game struct {
 18	ui *ebitenui.UI
 19}
 20
 21func NewGame() *Game {
 22
 23	button := widget.NewButton(
 24
 25		widget.ButtonOpts.TextLabel("Button"),
 26		widget.ButtonOpts.TextFace(DefaultFont()),
 27		widget.ButtonOpts.TextColor(&widget.ButtonTextColor{
 28			Idle:    colornames.Gainsboro,
 29			Hover:   colornames.Gainsboro,
 30			Pressed: colornames.Gainsboro,
 31		}),
 32
 33		widget.ButtonOpts.Image(&widget.ButtonImage{
 34			Idle:    DefaultPill(colornames.Darkslategray),
 35			Hover:   DefaultPill(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Mediumseagreen, 0.4)),
 36			Pressed: PressedPill(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Black, 0.4)),
 37		}),
 38
 39		widget.ButtonOpts.WidgetOpts(
 40			widget.WidgetOpts.LayoutData(widget.AnchorLayoutData{
 41				VerticalPosition:   widget.AnchorLayoutPositionCenter,
 42				HorizontalPosition: widget.AnchorLayoutPositionCenter,
 43			}),
 44			widget.WidgetOpts.MinSize(180, 48),
 45		),
 46
 47	)
 48
 49	button.GetWidget().CursorEnterEvent.Fire(&widget.WidgetCursorEnterEventArgs{})
 50	button.GetWidget().MouseButtonPressedEvent.Fire(&widget.WidgetMouseButtonPressedEventArgs{})
 51	root := widget.NewContainer(
 52		widget.ContainerOpts.BackgroundImage(
 53			image.NewNineSliceColor(colornames.Gainsboro),
 54		),
 55		widget.ContainerOpts.Layout(widget.NewAnchorLayout()),
 56	)
 57	root.AddChild(button)
 58	return &Game{
 59		ui: &ebitenui.UI{Container: root},
 60	}
 61}

 85func DefaultGem(base color.Color) *image.NineSlice {
 86	var size float32 = 64
 87	var tiles float32 = 16
 88	var padding float32 = 4
 89
 90	tile := (size - padding*2) / tiles
 91	fore := Mix(base, colornames.Gainsboro, 0.4)
 92	back := Mix(base, colornames.Black, 0.4)
 93	stroke := &vector.StrokeOptions{Width: 4, LineCap: vector.LineCapRound}
 94
 95	img := ebiten.NewImage(int(size), int(size))
 96	top := func(path *vector.Path) {
 97		path.MoveTo(padding, padding+size-tile*2)
 98		path.LineTo(padding, padding+tile*2)
 99		path.LineTo(padding+tile*2, padding)
100		path.LineTo(padding+size-tile*2, padding)
101	}
102	bottom := func(path *vector.Path) {
103		path.MoveTo(padding+size-tile*2, padding)
104		path.LineTo(padding+size-tile*2, padding+size-tile*4)
105		path.LineTo(padding+size-tile*4, padding+size-tile*2)
106		path.LineTo(padding, padding+size-tile*2)
107	}
108	path := &vector.Path{}
109	top(path)
110	bottom(path)
111	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
112	path.Reset()
113	top(path)
114	vector.StrokePath(img, path, fore, true, stroke)
115	path.Reset()
116	bottom(path)
117	vector.StrokePath(img, path, back, true, stroke)
118
119	return image.NewNineSliceBorder(img, int(tile*4))
120}
121
122func Mix(a, b color.Color, percent float64) color.Color {
123	rgba := func(c color.Color) (r, g, b, a uint8) {
124		r16, g16, b16, a16 := c.RGBA()
125		return uint8(r16 >> 8), uint8(g16 >> 8), uint8(b16 >> 8), uint8(a16 >> 8)
126	}
127	lerp := func(x, y uint8) uint8 {
128		return uint8(math.Round(float64(x) + percent*(float64(y)-float64(x))))
129	}
130	r1, g1, b1, a1 := rgba(a)
131	r2, g2, b2, a2 := rgba(b)
132
133	return color.RGBA{
134		R: lerp(r1, r2),
135		G: lerp(g1, g2),
136		B: lerp(b1, b2),
137		A: lerp(a1, a2),
138	}
139}

 26		widget.ButtonOpts.TextFace(DefaultFont()),
 27		widget.ButtonOpts.TextColor(&widget.ButtonTextColor{
 28			Idle:    colornames.Gainsboro,
 29			Hover:   colornames.Gainsboro,
 30			Pressed: colornames.Gainsboro,
 31		}),
 32
 33		widget.ButtonOpts.Image(&widget.ButtonImage{
 34			Idle:    DefaultGem(colornames.Darkslategray),
 35			Hover:   DefaultGem(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Mediumseagreen, 0.4)),
 36			Pressed: DefaultGem(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Black, 0.4)),
 37		}),
 38
 39		widget.ButtonOpts.WidgetOpts(
 40			widget.WidgetOpts.LayoutData(widget.AnchorLayoutData{
 41				VerticalPosition:   widget.AnchorLayoutPositionCenter,
 42				HorizontalPosition: widget.AnchorLayoutPositionCenter,
 43			}),
 44			widget.WidgetOpts.MinSize(180, 48),
 45		),
 46
 47	)
 48
 49	button.GetWidget().CursorEnterEvent.Fire(&widget.WidgetCursorEnterEventArgs{})
 50	button.GetWidget().MouseButtonPressedEvent.Fire(&widget.WidgetMouseButtonPressedEventArgs{})
 51	root := widget.NewContainer(
 52		widget.ContainerOpts.BackgroundImage(
 53			image.NewNineSliceColor(colornames.Gainsboro),
 54		),
 55		widget.ContainerOpts.Layout(widget.NewAnchorLayout()),
 56	)
 57	root.AddChild(button)
 58	return &Game{
 59		ui: &ebitenui.UI{Container: root},
 60	}
 61}

 76func DefaultFont() text.Face {

 83		Size:   20,
 84	}

 87func DefaultGem(base color.Color) *image.NineSlice {
 88	var size float32 = 64
 89	var tiles float32 = 16
 90	var padding float32 = 4
 91
 92	tile := (size - padding*2) / tiles
 93	fore := Mix(base, colornames.Gainsboro, 0.4)
 94	back := Mix(base, colornames.Black, 0.4)
 95	stroke := &vector.StrokeOptions{Width: 4, LineCap: vector.LineCapRound}
 96
 97	img := ebiten.NewImage(int(size), int(size))
 98	top := func(path *vector.Path) {
 99		path.MoveTo(padding, padding+size-tile*2)
100		path.LineTo(padding, padding+tile*2)
101		path.LineTo(padding+tile*2, padding)
102		path.LineTo(padding+size-tile*2, padding)
103	}
104	bottom := func(path *vector.Path) {
105		path.MoveTo(padding+size-tile*2, padding)
106		path.LineTo(padding+size-tile*2, padding+size-tile*4)
107		path.LineTo(padding+size-tile*4, padding+size-tile*2)
108		path.LineTo(padding, padding+size-tile*2)
109	}
110	path := &vector.Path{}
111	top(path)
112	bottom(path)
113	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
114	path.Reset()
115	top(path)
116	vector.StrokePath(img, path, fore, true, stroke)
117	path.Reset()
118	bottom(path)
119	vector.StrokePath(img, path, back, true, stroke)
120
121	return image.NewNineSliceBorder(img, int(tile*4))
122}
123
124func Mix(a, b color.Color, percent float64) color.Color {
125	rgba := func(c color.Color) (r, g, b, a uint8) {
126		r16, g16, b16, a16 := c.RGBA()
127		return uint8(r16 >> 8), uint8(g16 >> 8), uint8(b16 >> 8), uint8(a16 >> 8)
128	}
129	lerp := func(x, y uint8) uint8 {
130		return uint8(math.Round(float64(x) + percent*(float64(y)-float64(x))))
131	}
132	r1, g1, b1, a1 := rgba(a)
133	r2, g2, b2, a2 := rgba(b)
134
135	return color.RGBA{
136		R: lerp(r1, r2),
137		G: lerp(g1, g2),
138		B: lerp(b1, b2),
139		A: lerp(a1, a2),
140	}
141}

147		panic(err)
148	}

Ignore Transparent Pixels

Responsible for ignoring transparent pixels when the button is clicked.

Enabled:
 1button := widget.NewButton(
 2		widget.ButtonOpts.IgnoreTransparentPixels(true),
 3		widget.ButtonOpts.CursorEnteredHandler(
 4			func(args *widget.ButtonHoverEventArgs) {
 5				var b strings.Builder
 6				fmt.Fprintf(&b, "Cursor Entered\n")
 7				fmt.Fprintf(&b, "> Offset: %d, %d\n", args.OffsetX, args.OffsetY)
 8				fmt.Print(b.String())
 9			},
10		),
11	)

100func DefaultNineSlice(base color.Color) *image.NineSlice {
101	var size float32 = 64
102	var tiles float32 = 16
103	var radius float32 = 8
104
105	tile := size / tiles
106	facet := Mix(base, colornames.Gainsboro, 0.2)
107
108	img := ebiten.NewImage(int(size), int(size))
109	path := RoundedRectPath(0, tile, size, size-tile, radius, radius, radius, radius)
110	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
111	path = RoundedRectPath(0, tile, size, size-tile*2, radius, radius, radius, radius)
112	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, facet, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
113	path = RoundedRectPath(tile, tile*2, size-tile*2, size-tile*4, radius, radius, radius, radius)
114	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
115
116	return image.NewNineSliceBorder(img, int(tile*4))
117}
118
119func PressedNineSlice(base color.Color) *image.NineSlice {
120	var size float32 = 64
121	var tiles float32 = 16
122	var radius float32 = 8
123
124	tile := size / tiles
125	facet := Mix(base, colornames.Gainsboro, 0.2)
126
127	img := ebiten.NewImage(int(size), int(size))
128	path := RoundedRectPath(0, 0, size, size, radius, radius, radius, radius)
129	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, facet, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
130	path = RoundedRectPath(tile, tile, size-tile*2, size-tile*2, radius, radius, radius, radius)
131	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
132
133	return image.NewNineSliceBorder(img, int(tile*4))
134}
135
136func Mix(a, b color.Color, percent float64) color.Color {
137	rgba := func(c color.Color) (r, g, b, a uint8) {
138		r16, g16, b16, a16 := c.RGBA()
139		return uint8(r16 >> 8), uint8(g16 >> 8), uint8(b16 >> 8), uint8(a16 >> 8)
140	}
141	lerp := func(x, y uint8) uint8 {
142		return uint8(math.Round(float64(x) + percent*(float64(y)-float64(x))))
143	}
144	r1, g1, b1, a1 := rgba(a)
145	r2, g2, b2, a2 := rgba(b)
146
147	return color.RGBA{
148		R: lerp(r1, r2),
149		G: lerp(g1, g2),
150		B: lerp(b1, b2),
151		A: lerp(a1, a2),
152	}
153}
154
155func RoundedRectPath(x, y, w, h, tl, tr, br, bl float32) *vector.Path {
156	path := &vector.Path{}
157
158	path.Arc(x+w-tr, y+tr, tr, 3*math.Pi/2, 0, vector.Clockwise)
159	path.LineTo(x+w, y+h-br)
160	path.Arc(x+w-br, y+h-br, br, 0, math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)
161	path.LineTo(x+bl, y+h)
162	path.Arc(x+bl, y+h-bl, bl, math.Pi/2, math.Pi, vector.Clockwise)
163	path.LineTo(x, y+tl)
164	path.Arc(x+tl, y+tl, tl, math.Pi, 3*math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)
165	path.Close()
166
167	return path
168}
169
170func main() {
171	ebiten.SetWindowSize(480, 320)
172	ebiten.SetWindowResizingMode(ebiten.WindowResizingModeEnabled)
173	if err := ebiten.RunGame(NewGame()); err != nil {
174		panic(err)
175	}
176}

  1package main
  2
  3import (
  4	"bytes"
  5	"fmt"
  6	"image/color"
  7	"math"
  8	"strings"
  9	"github.com/ebitenui/ebitenui"
 10	"github.com/ebitenui/ebitenui/image"
 11	"github.com/ebitenui/ebitenui/widget"
 12	"github.com/hajimehoshi/ebiten/v2"
 13	"github.com/hajimehoshi/ebiten/v2/text/v2"
 14	"github.com/hajimehoshi/ebiten/v2/vector"
 15	"golang.org/x/image/font/gofont/goregular"
 16	"golang.org/x/image/colornames"
 17)
 18
 19type Game struct {
 20	ui *ebitenui.UI
 21}
 22
 23func NewGame() *Game {
 24
 25	button := widget.NewButton(
 26
 27		widget.ButtonOpts.TextLabel("Button"),
 28		widget.ButtonOpts.TextFace(DefaultFont()),
 29		widget.ButtonOpts.TextColor(&widget.ButtonTextColor{
 30			Idle:    colornames.Gainsboro,
 31			Hover:   colornames.Gainsboro,
 32			Pressed: Mix(colornames.Gainsboro, colornames.Black, 0.4),
 33		}),
 34		widget.ButtonOpts.Image(&widget.ButtonImage{
 35			Idle:         DefaultNineSlice(colornames.Darkslategray),
 36			Hover:        DefaultNineSlice(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Mediumseagreen, 0.4)),
 37			Disabled:     DefaultNineSlice(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Gainsboro, 0.8)),
 38			Pressed:      PressedNineSlice(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Black, 0.4)),
 39			PressedHover: PressedNineSlice(Mix(colornames.Darkslategray, colornames.Black, 0.4)),
 40		}),
 41
 42		widget.ButtonOpts.IgnoreTransparentPixels(false),
 43		widget.ButtonOpts.CursorEnteredHandler(
 44			func(args *widget.ButtonHoverEventArgs) {
 45				var b strings.Builder
 46				fmt.Fprintf(&b, "Cursor Entered\n")
 47				fmt.Fprintf(&b, "> Offset: %d, %d\n", args.OffsetX, args.OffsetY)
 48				fmt.Print(b.String())
 49			},
 50		),
 51
 52		widget.ButtonOpts.WidgetOpts(
 53			widget.WidgetOpts.LayoutData(widget.AnchorLayoutData{
 54				VerticalPosition:   widget.AnchorLayoutPositionCenter,
 55				HorizontalPosition: widget.AnchorLayoutPositionCenter,
 56			}),
 57			widget.WidgetOpts.MinSize(180, 48),
 58		),
 59
 60	)
 61
 62	button.GetWidget().CursorEnterEvent.Fire(&widget.WidgetCursorEnterEventArgs{})
 63	root := widget.NewContainer(
 64		widget.ContainerOpts.BackgroundImage(
 65			image.NewNineSliceColor(colornames.Gainsboro),
 66		),
 67		widget.ContainerOpts.Layout(widget.NewAnchorLayout()),
 68	)
 69	root.AddChild(button)
 70
 71	return &Game{
 72		ui: &ebitenui.UI{Container: root},
 73	}
 74}
 75
 76func (g *Game) Update() error {
 77	g.ui.Update()
 78	return nil
 79}
 80
 81func (g *Game) Draw(screen *ebiten.Image) {
 82	g.ui.Draw(screen)
 83}
 84
 85func (g *Game) Layout(w, h int) (int, int) {
 86	return w, h
 87}
 88
 89func DefaultFont() text.Face {
 90	s, err := text.NewGoTextFaceSource(bytes.NewReader(goregular.TTF))
 91	if err != nil {
 92		panic(err)
 93	}
 94	return &text.GoTextFace{
 95		Source: s,
 96		Size:   20,
 97	}
 98}
 99
100func DefaultNineSlice(base color.Color) *image.NineSlice {
101	var size float32 = 64
102	var tiles float32 = 16
103	var radius float32 = 8
104
105	tile := size / tiles
106	facet := Mix(base, colornames.Gainsboro, 0.2)
107
108	img := ebiten.NewImage(int(size), int(size))
109	path := RoundedRectPath(0, tile, size, size-tile, radius, radius, radius, radius)
110	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
111	path = RoundedRectPath(0, tile, size, size-tile*2, radius, radius, radius, radius)
112	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, facet, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
113	path = RoundedRectPath(tile, tile*2, size-tile*2, size-tile*4, radius, radius, radius, radius)
114	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
115
116	return image.NewNineSliceBorder(img, int(tile*4))
117}
118
119func PressedNineSlice(base color.Color) *image.NineSlice {
120	var size float32 = 64
121	var tiles float32 = 16
122	var radius float32 = 8
123
124	tile := size / tiles
125	facet := Mix(base, colornames.Gainsboro, 0.2)
126
127	img := ebiten.NewImage(int(size), int(size))
128	path := RoundedRectPath(0, 0, size, size, radius, radius, radius, radius)
129	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, facet, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
130	path = RoundedRectPath(tile, tile, size-tile*2, size-tile*2, radius, radius, radius, radius)
131	vector.DrawFilledPath(img, path, base, true, vector.FillRuleEvenOdd)
132
133	return image.NewNineSliceBorder(img, int(tile*4))
134}
135
136func Mix(a, b color.Color, percent float64) color.Color {
137	rgba := func(c color.Color) (r, g, b, a uint8) {
138		r16, g16, b16, a16 := c.RGBA()
139		return uint8(r16 >> 8), uint8(g16 >> 8), uint8(b16 >> 8), uint8(a16 >> 8)
140	}
141	lerp := func(x, y uint8) uint8 {
142		return uint8(math.Round(float64(x) + percent*(float64(y)-float64(x))))
143	}
144	r1, g1, b1, a1 := rgba(a)
145	r2, g2, b2, a2 := rgba(b)
146
147	return color.RGBA{
148		R: lerp(r1, r2),
149		G: lerp(g1, g2),
150		B: lerp(b1, b2),
151		A: lerp(a1, a2),
152	}
153}
154
155func RoundedRectPath(x, y, w, h, tl, tr, br, bl float32) *vector.Path {
156	path := &vector.Path{}
157
158	path.Arc(x+w-tr, y+tr, tr, 3*math.Pi/2, 0, vector.Clockwise)
159	path.LineTo(x+w, y+h-br)
160	path.Arc(x+w-br, y+h-br, br, 0, math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)
161	path.LineTo(x+bl, y+h)
162	path.Arc(x+bl, y+h-bl, bl, math.Pi/2, math.Pi, vector.Clockwise)
163	path.LineTo(x, y+tl)
164	path.Arc(x+tl, y+tl, tl, math.Pi, 3*math.Pi/2, vector.Clockwise)
165	path.Close()
166
167	return path
168}

171	ebiten.SetWindowSize(480, 320)
172	ebiten.SetWindowResizingMode(ebiten.WindowResizingModeEnabled)
173	if err := ebiten.RunGame(NewGame()); err != nil {
174		panic(err)
175	}
176}

Widget handlers

Clicked Handler

Triggered when a release is performed anywhere after a press, its the default in most cases.

 1button := widget.NewButton(
 2    widget.ButtonOpts.ClickedHandler(
 3        func(args *widget.ButtonClickedEventArgs) {
 4            var b strings.Builder
 5            fmt.Fprintf(&b, "Button Clicked\n")
 6            fmt.Fprintf(&b, "> Offset: %d, %d\n", args.OffsetX, args.OffsetY)
 7            fmt.Print(b.String())
 8        },
 9    ),
10)
Pressed Handler

Triggered when a press is performed inside a widget, useful for long presses with different timings.

 1button := widget.NewButton(
 2    widget.ButtonOpts.PressedHandler(
 3        func(args *widget.ButtonPressedEventArgs) {
 4            var b strings.Builder
 5            fmt.Fprintf(&b, "Button Pressed\n")
 6            fmt.Fprintf(&b, "> Offset: %d, %d\n", args.OffsetX, args.OffsetY)
 7            fmt.Print(b.String())
 8        },
 9    ),
10)
Released Handler

Triggered when a release is performed inside a widget, useful for drag-n-drop things from one widget to another.

 1button := widget.NewButton(
 2    widget.ButtonOpts.ReleasedHandler(
 3        func(args *widget.ButtonReleasedEventArgs) {
 4            var b strings.Builder
 5            fmt.Fprintf(&b, "Button Released\n")
 6            fmt.Fprintf(&b, "> Inside: %v\n", args.Inside)
 7            fmt.Fprintf(&b, "> Offset: %d, %d\n", args.OffsetX, args.OffsetY)
 8            fmt.Print(b.String())
 9        },
10    ),
11)
Cursor Entered Handler

Triggered when the cursor enters the button area.

 1button := widget.NewButton(
 2    widget.ButtonOpts.CursorEnteredHandler(
 3        func(args *widget.ButtonHoverEventArgs) {
 4            var b strings.Builder
 5            fmt.Fprintf(&b, "Cursor Entered\n")
 6            fmt.Fprintf(&b, "> Offset: %d, %d\n", args.OffsetX, args.OffsetY)
 7            fmt.Fprintf(&b, "> Diff: %d, %d\n", args.DiffX, args.DiffY)
 8            fmt.Print(b.String())
 9        },
10    ),
11)
Cursor Moved Handler

Triggered when the cursor moves within the button area between entered and exited events.

 1button := widget.NewButton(
 2    widget.ButtonOpts.CursorMovedHandler(
 3        func(args *widget.ButtonHoverEventArgs) {
 4            var b strings.Builder
 5            fmt.Fprintf(&b, "Cursor Moved\n")
 6            fmt.Fprintf(&b, "> Offset: %d, %d\n", args.OffsetX, args.OffsetY)
 7            fmt.Fprintf(&b, "> Diff: %d, %d\n", args.DiffX, args.DiffY)
 8            fmt.Print(b.String())
 9        },
10    ),
11)
Cursor Exited Handler

Triggered when the cursor exits the button area.

 1button := widget.NewButton(
 2    widget.ButtonOpts.CursorExitedHandler(
 3        func(args *widget.ButtonHoverEventArgs) {
 4            var b strings.Builder
 5            fmt.Fprintf(&b, "Cursor Exited\n")
 6            fmt.Fprintf(&b, "> Offset: %d, %d\n", args.OffsetX, args.OffsetY)
 7            fmt.Fprintf(&b, "> Diff: %d, %d\n", args.DiffX, args.DiffY)
 8            fmt.Print(b.String())
 9        },
10    ),
11)
State Changed Handler

Triggered when the button’s state changes like disabled, hovered, pressed, etc.

 1button := widget.NewButton(
 2    widget.ButtonOpts.StateChangedHandler(
 3        func(args *widget.ButtonChangedEventArgs) {
 4            var b strings.Builder
 5            fmt.Fprintf(&b, "Button State Changed\n")
 6            fmt.Fprintf(&b, "> State: %v\n", args.State)
 7            fmt.Fprintf(&b, "> Offset: %d, %d\n", args.OffsetX, args.OffsetY)
 8            fmt.Print(b.String())
 9        },
10    ),
11)
